chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: Rbar
a: Rbar
x: R

Goal:
Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> exists delta : posreal, forall y : R, Rabs (y - x) < delta -> Rbar_lt a y /\ Rbar_lt y b

Premises:
Rbar_lt = fun x y : Rbar => match x with | Finite x0 => match y with | Finite y0 => x0 < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => False | m_infty => match y with | m_infty => False | _ => True end end : Rbar -> Rbar -> Prop
*** [ R : Set ]
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
Rbar_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Rbar_lt_le_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_le_lt_trans : forall x y z : Rbar, Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y z -> Rbar_lt x z
Rbar_plus_lt_compat : forall a b c d : Rbar, Rbar_lt a b -> Rbar_lt c d -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_plus a c) (Rbar_plus b d)
Rbar_opp_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt (Rbar_opp x) (Rbar_opp y) < -> Rbar_lt y x
Rbar_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le x y
Rbar_lt_not_eq : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt x y -> x <> y
Rbar_lt_not_le : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_lt y x -> ~ Rbar_le x y
Rbar_le_not_lt : forall x y : Rbar, Rbar_le y x -> ~ Rbar_lt x y
Rbar_not_le_lt : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_le x y -> Rbar_lt y x
Rbar_not_lt_le : forall x y : Rbar, ~ Rbar_lt x y -> Rbar_le y x
Rbar_div_pos_lt : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_lt x y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_div_pos x z) (Rbar_div_pos y z)
Rbar_mult_pos_lt : forall (x y : Rbar) (z : posreal), Rbar_lt x y < -> Rbar_lt (Rbar_mult_pos x z) (Rbar_mult_pos y z)
derivable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists delta : posreal, forall h : R, h <> 0 -> Rabs h < delta -> Rabs ((f (x + h) - f x) / h - l) < eps : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope _]
disc = fun (x : R) (delta : posreal) (y : R) => Rabs (y - x) < delta : R -> posreal -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope _ R_scope]
Req_lt_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y
Req_le_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) <= eps) -> x = y
Rbar_lt_dec : forall x y : Rbar, {Rbar_lt x y} + {~ Rbar_lt x y}
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
is_Rbar_mult_m_infty_pos : forall x : Rbar, Rbar_lt 0 x -> is_Rbar_mult m_infty x m_infty
is_Rbar_mult_p_infty_pos : forall x : Rbar, Rbar_lt 0 x -> is_Rbar_mult p_infty x p_infty
is_Rbar_mult_p_infty_neg : forall x : Rbar, Rbar_lt x 0 -> is_Rbar_mult p_infty x m_infty
is_Rbar_mult_m_infty_neg : forall x : Rbar, Rbar_lt x 0 -> is_Rbar_mult m_infty x p_infty
cond_eq : forall x y : R, (forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
RiemannInt_P2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> a <= b -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
RiemannInt_P11 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (phi1 phi2 psi1 psi2 : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi1 n t) <= psi1 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi1 n)) < un n) -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi2 n t) <= psi2 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi2 n)) < un n) -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi2 N)) l
